suggested_query: The surface of the water was smooth, with only slight ripples from the occasional fish breaking the tension. The sun beat down on it, sending ripples of heat into the air. The silence was almost palpable, broken only by the occasional chirp of a bird or the soft lapping of the water against the shore.
